permaviss.simplicial_complexes.differentials¶

differentials.py

This module computes the differentials of a given filtered complex. Put test that composition of differentials is 0

Functions

complex_differentials(C, p)

Given a simplicial complex C, it returns a list D with its differentials mod p A simplicial complex C is assumed to have first entries the radius associated to the simplices.
permaviss.simplicial_complexes.differentials.complex_differentials(C, p)[source]¶

Given a simplicial complex C, it returns a list D with its differentials mod p A simplicial complex C is assumed to have first entries the radius associated to the simplices. C[0] contains the edges, C[1] contains the 2-simplexes, and so on. D[0] contanins the number of points D[1] contains the 1st differential, D[2] contains the 2nd differential, and so on
